title: Can i get punnished?
body:
{{champion:25}} {{summoner:3}} 
1. **Can i get Punnished after this connection problem Riot is having? i followed their instructions, didnt work for me, i even send bugsplat report with email and name to it.**

replies.body:
There isn't a connection issue going on, but there is the bug that causes you to have to hit the *cancel*, then *reconnect* buttons to reach in-game for some matches. Bugsplats are definitely not part of the *known issue* though, so I'd recommend troubleshooting this by working through the common fixes in our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes). I also wanted to mention that a single disconnection cannot land you in any sort of penalty, but if you had a *recent trend* of disconnections on your account, then it would be possible to receive a penalty from this disconnection.

Let me know if those steps helped.

{{champion:25}}{{summoner:3}}  **I am also repairing the client atm to see if i can reconnect, but looks like the repair takes longer than the game would, so year... i hope i dont get penalty on my other account.**
